Database

Class SQLiteConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.SQLiteConnection

  • public class SQLiteConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Database: SQLiteConnection.
    • An internal class responsible for bridging the application with the local sqlite3 database.
    • If there is no database currently available, it creates one, as well as the PlayerInfo table.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    SÃ©rgio de Aguiar (pioavenger)

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get function for the database connection.
        Returns:
        An instance of a connection to the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When there was a database associated issue.

      • isUserRegistered

        public static boolean isUserRegistered(java.lang.String discordID)
        Get function for checking whether a user is registered to the database.
        Parameters:
        discordID - The user's discord ID.
        Returns:
        True if the user in question is present in the database (registered), and false otherwise.

      • registerUser

        Function that adds a new user to the database.
        Parameters:
        discordID - The user's discord ID.
        Returns:
        True is the user was registered with success, and false otherwise.
